name: P. CENTORE & ASSOCIATES
goal:
legai resources in the following areas of practice: national and international taxation, financial, corporate and securities and related matters, including litigation and opinions in tax matter (value added tax, customs law and duties).
Organisation of conferences for clients and professionals working in the tax field.
euInitiatives:
our organization doesn't take care of activities in terms of interaction with the EU institutions, except for the attendance of Mr. Paolo Centore as member of the Vat Expert Group at the European Commission (Mr. Galleani d'Agliano is his alternate).
The appointment is on an individual and academic basis and, according to the rules of VEG the members are not entitled to follow and attempt to influence EU policies on behalf of their clients.
Therefore our Firm does not influence EU policies on behalf of their clients.
